settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for all unused items in their original packaging. Please contact our customer service team to initiate a return.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Standard shipping typically takes 3-5 business days within the continental US. International shipping may take 7-14 business days depending on your location.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping rates and delivery times vary by location. You can see the available shipping options during checkout.
